name: Godsend
description: Godsend™ is a medieval action-adventure game that explores faith, war, and humanity. Experience the journey for yourself, or grab some friends to battle with or against.  You play as Celt, a crusader that shows up in the Arabian town of Edessa.  After exploring this mysterious desert town and uncovering its secrets, you must gather allies to help defend against an impending attack from a formidable foe.
